Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that there was no student named Chris Williams injured in the Parkland shooting and no news stories mentioned his heroic actions.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support as there are no news stories or reports confirming the existence of Chris Williams or his actions.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the image depicts high school senior Chris Williams, but there is no evidence to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the image used in the claim likely originated from the Instagram account of the person depicted, suggesting that it may not be related to the Parkland shooting at all.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the involvement and heroism of Chris Williams by falsely attributing actions to him that were actually performed by another student named Anthony Borges.
